Additional notes:

A soundtrack for the movie "The Edge of Hell" / "Rock 'n' Roll Nightmare".

Released on LP (GWLP 13) under the "Tritonz" alias.

Recorded and mixed at Triton Sound, Toronto, Ontario, Canada and at Track Studios, New York, USA.

Released in 1987 on LP (E-30.1259) in Spain.

Full soundtrack for the movie (27 songs) released in 2006 on CD as "Rock 'n' Roll Nightmare". Thankx to Metal archive for nfo
